Hey did you get those records from my doctor? Do you need anything else from me?
episodes.natural_language:
Case Tina-Smith-S&F-4-2-2025 involves the client Tina Smith. The client asked whether the records from her doctor have been obtained and whether anything else is needed from her.

Her message to the team reads: "Hey did you get those records from my doctor? Do you need anything else from me?"
